title: Backed by the best
text: Spinertia emerges as a solution to the current gaps in wearable technology for spinal health. It stands out as the first device to offer a real-time spinal model, a crucial advancement for enhancing athlete training and treatment. Backed by leading medical professionals, Spinertia is the first of its kind to offer a real-time spinal model, a crucial advancement for enhancing athlete training and treatment.
